item.title: Resident Evil Requiem is ‚ÄòAlmost Like Having Two Games‚Äô, Says Director
item.content:encoded:
Resident Evil Requiem director has arrived with new details about the upcoming title after their big reveal at The Game Awards 2025, stating it‚Äôs almost like playing two games.

Capcom has kept a lot of stuff under wraps since Resident Evil Requiem was revealed, with Leon Kennedy being playable as the biggest secret of them all. However, we had an idea from the leaks, but confirmation was required. Now that Leon has been officially confirmed, the director has revealed how the gameplay of both characters contrasts.

Resident Evil Requiem‚Äôs Leon and Grace Sections are ‚ÄòAlmost Equally Split‚Äô, But Heavily Differ From Each Other

During a new interview with Automaton, Resident Evil Requiem director Akifumi Nakanishi spoke about Leon and Grace‚Äôs gameplay, along with other details. Nakanishi first revealed that ‚Äúin terms of gameplay, Grace and Leon‚Äôs playable sections are almost equally split,‚Äù with the structure being similar to Revelations. The director added that Leon isn‚Äôt ‚Äúwell suited to horror‚Äù, hence his sections ‚Äúfocus on intense, adrenaline-pumping action‚Äù. Grace has the scarier sections, and the devs are ‚Äúreally emphasizing the difference in their experiences this time.‚Äù

Nakanishi explains that the two experiences are ‚Äúalmost like having two games with completely different types of tension mixed together.‚Äù Players would feel like ‚Äújumping into a cold bath after sitting in a hot sauna,‚Äù he said while laughing. The director also revealed that Leon‚Äôs chapters are where the players will feel safer and scared again when Grace comes back on. It is a ‚Äúconsciously designed horror structure,‚Äù he stated.

In other news, Resident Evil Code Veronica and Zero Remakes are reportedly scheduled for 2027 and 2028, respectively. Additionally, Requiem might have another playable character. What are your thoughts on Resident Evil Requiem feeling like almost two different games? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about the Stellar Blade director receiving recognition from the South Korean president. Don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: Resident Evil Code Veronica and Zero Remakes Scheduled for 2027 & 2028 Respectively, It‚Äôs Claimed
item.content:encoded:
Resident Evil insider has revealed details about the release windows for Code Veronica and Zero Remakes.

Based on insider information, it was already known that the next remakes in development for the Resident Evil franchise are allegedly Code Veronica and Zero. The insider had also revealed earlier that these games are scheduled for 2027/2028, but didn‚Äôt have exact details. Now, he is back with more.

Resident Evil Code Veronica Remake Will Reportedly be Announced Next Year, And Release in 2027

The new details about Resident Evil Code Veronica and Zero Remakes come from a prominent insider, Dusk Golem. Most recently, their highly anticipated leak about Leon being playable in Requiem was proven to be true through a new trailer at The Game Awards 2025. Now they are back with a new scoop, this time providing us with the announcement and release windows for the next remakes in the franchise.

According to Dusk Golem‚Äôs new post on X (formerly Twitter), they have heard that Code Veronica will be announced in 2026 and released in 2027. The Zero Remake is scheduled to release in 2028. Readers should take this information with a grain of salt, as there is no official announcement regarding these release windows, and they may change depending on how development progresses.

Back in October 2025, it was reportedly revealed that Resident Evil 0 Remake is in development under the nickname ‚ÄòChamber‚Äò and won‚Äôt be released until 2028. Additionally, Resident Evil Requiem leak suggests there‚Äôs another playable character. Do you think Resident Evil Code Veronica and Zero remakes will be released in 2027 and 2028, respectively? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about the Stellar Blade director receiving recognition from the South Korean president. Don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: ARC Raiders Cold Snap and Flickering Flames Update Notes‚ÄîWinter Hits Speranza
item.content:encoded:
Embark Studios has published all the information you could want to know about the upcoming Cold Snap update, which includes the Flickering Flames event and the new Raider Deck. The update drops on all platforms tomorrow, and there are stacks to learn about what‚Äôs coming next in ARC Raiders.

The update includes a new community challenge, a fresh series of Feats to complete to unlock free rewards, and map conditions that present a dire threat to Raiders everywhere.

Cold Snap: New Map Condition

From December 16, ARC Raiders players will be able to jump onto maps blanketed with snow and featuring a new map condition: Cold Snap. This condition is harmful and poses a serious threat to players:

During the Cold Snap condition, the clock is ticking. The freezing weather will cut your Raider down in minutes unless you get indoors, or heal up quickly. Bear this in mind when engaging other Raiders ‚Äì getting pinned down in the open is a death sentence during a Rust Belt winter.

Flickering Flames is the new event coming to ARC Raiders tomorrow. The details have been outlined in a recent blog post published by Embark Studios:

Below ground, the tenacity of the human spirit endures. Despite food scarcity and rolling blackouts, survivors gather to light candles, swap war stories, and appreciate what little they have. The festival of Flickering Flames is about to begin.

The Candleberry Bush forms the centerpiece of these festivities. For Speranzans, this hardy plant is a versatile asset during the winter months: boiling the berry creates a wax that burns for hours. Crushing them yields a refreshing juice while the roots make for a tea that drives out the toughest colds. Candleberries make hearty stews, warming soups, and gifts of perfume and soap, while the wreaths can be fashioned into festive decorations that offer Speranzans a hint of Topside‚Äôs greenery. Speranza needs A LOT of them for the Candleberry Banquets!

Speranzans rely on other essential items through the winter too. Light and heat sources boost morale and help keep Speranzans comfortable, while giving them the best chance to fight through to the spring.

When you collect Candleberries and ‚Äòother special items‚Äô, you‚Äôll receive Raider Tokens, new items, rare utility items, weapons, cosmetics, and merit tokens, so there‚Äôs some give and take there. Players can unlock Merits simply for playing ARC Raiders, but finding and extracting Candleberries will elevate their gains.

An all-new Raider Deck will be introduced from December 26th, featuring a series of exclusive and free unlocks:

With our Winter Update, we‚Äôre also introducing our second free, permanent Raider Deck. Available from the 26th December, The Goalie Raider Deck lets you unlock a series of items, Raider Tokens, and Cosmetics as you earn Cred Topside. 

The flagship skin of the new Raider Deck is an old world outfit that some Speranzans have claimed was worn by the world‚Äôs most fierce and respected gladiators. Who knows, really? But hey, it comes with a pretty cool new hockey stick Raider Tool.

As explained, the new skin comes with the first new Raider Tool, which takes the form of a hockey stick, because why not?

Flickering Flames is a limited-time, winter-themed event that runs from December 16 until January 13, so be quick if you want to maximize your rewards.

Let us know on the Insider Gaming Discord server if you‚Äôre looking forward to the Cold Snap update.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Stellar Blade‚Äôs director has received a presidential commendation

item.title: Build To Climb Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Build To Climb monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Stumps, Pets and much more. 

Planting the tallest Stumps to reach the top and potentially to the next map is the primary goal of Build to Climb. Purchasing different Stumps will deplete your treasury and will take some time to earn all the money back. Plus, you will need the help of Pets to boost your Cash income. This is when you should use the active Build to Climb codes. Claim free Stumps and Pets using these codes. You‚Äôll easily reach 9.6km and progress further within a few hours after redeeming the Roblox game codes. 

Active Build To Climb Codes 

  • WELCOMEBUILDTOCLIMB ‚Äì Mint Stump and Cat

Inactive Build To Climb Codes

There are no expired codes in Build to Climb. If any active code goes inactive, it‚Äôll be added here. Redeem all the active codes in a single sitting as they risk going inactive at any moment. 

How To Redeem Build To Climb Codes

Redeem all the active codes by following these steps: 

  1. Launch Build to Climb and spawn on the map. 
  2. Now, press the small Discord icon located in the top-right corner of the screen. 
  3. Enter the active code into the ‚ÄúEnter Code‚Äù text box. 
  4. Click the ‚ÄúCHECK‚Äù button to redeem the active code. 

More About Build To Climb Codes

Stumps are very important and contribute heavily to the Build to Climb gameplay. Players can easily increase the overall height of their giant stalks by using the free Stumps obtained from codes. The core principle of Build to Climb is that the more distance you cover, the more Cash you earn. You can easily earn thousands of Cash and invest it into new Stumps, however, note that certain Stumps must be unlocked by reaching specific height milestones.

  • Blue Stump ‚Äì 1km ‚Äì 10,000$
  • Chocolate Stump ‚Äì 2.8km ‚Äì 40,000$
  • Purple Stump ‚Äì 3.9km ‚Äì 130,000$
  • Lemon Stump ‚Äì 6.8km ‚Äì 800,000$

With that sorted, try purchasing Eggs to obtain Pets that provide Cash multipliers. The Cat, which is redeemed from an active code, is part of Egg 1. Below are all the Eggs, their Pets, and their hatch chances:

FAQs On Build To Climb Codes

What are the latest codes in Build To Climb?

‚ÄúWELCOMEBUILDTOCLIMB‚Äù is the only latest active code in Build to Climb. 

What types of Pets can be redeemed from the codes?

As of now, only the basic Cat is the only redeemable Pet. 

When are new codes released? 

You can expect new codes to drop during major events and special updates.

item.title: Blade Battle Codes (December 2025)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Blade Battle monthly redeem codes for December 2025 to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Gems, Spins, EXP Buffs and much more. 

Tired of barely lasting 5 minutes on the Blade Battle map? Then you need the active Roblox Blade Battle codes to grab free rewards like Gems, Spins, and Exp buffs. Use the free Gems to buy Boxes and unlock stronger Blades with higher Damage and Blade HP. Spins can give you Potions, Gems, Exp, and even the rare Hell Sickle if you‚Äôre lucky. New players can quickly become one of the strongest on the map and unlock better Blades just by redeeming the codes highlighted below.

Active Blade Battle Codes

  • UPD2 ‚Äì 5000 Gems (Latest)
  • HAPPY ‚Äì Spin
  • CODE ‚Äì Spin
  • UPD1 ‚Äì 3 minutes EXP Buff

Inactive Blade Battle Codes

There are no invalid codes for Blade Battle. If any code goes inactive, it‚Äôll be added here. Players are advised to redeem all the active codes in a single session as they risk expiring at any time. You can also expect new codes during major events and big in-game updates. 

How To Redeem Blade Battle Codes

Follow these steps to redeem all the active codes in Blade Battle: 

  1. Launch Blade Battle and enter the server. 
  2. Select the ‚ÄúABX‚Äù button to open the code box. 
  3. Enter any code into the ‚ÄúUPD1‚Äù text box. 
  4. Press the ‚ÄúVerify‚Äù button to redeem the code. 

More About Blade Battle Codes

The free Gems, Spins, and Exp buffs help your character grow stronger and unlock new Blades faster. These free resources also solve your early-game financial issues, so you can start buying Common and Rare Boxes right after redeeming the Gem codes.

To use the free Spins, press the ‚ÄúSpin‚Äù button. The free Spins are added to your account automatically. The Spin chances and rewards in Blade Battle are:

  • Hell Sickle ‚Äì 1%
  • Speed Potion ‚Äì 8%
  • +10,000 Gems ‚Äì 10%
  • +5000 Gems ‚Äì 17%
  • +10,000 Exp ‚Äì 26%
  • +3000 Exp ‚Äì 38%

Here are all the starting stats and price of all the Upgrades: 

  • Luck 1 to 2 ‚Äì 3k Gems
  • Double Gem Chance 1 to 2 ‚Äì 3k Gems
  • Blade +1 Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems
  • Blade DMG Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems
  • Blade Speed Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems
  • Blade Recovery Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems
  • Blade HP Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems
  • Body HP Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems
  • Move Speed Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems
  • Increase Critical Max ‚Äì 8 to 9 ‚Äì 10k Gems

Boxes are very important in the game. They give you different Blades, each with its own rarity and strength. Here are all the Boxes in Blade Battle, along with their chances and prices:

FAQs On Blade Battle Codes

What are the latest active codes in Blade Battle? 

‚ÄúUPD2‚Äù is the latest active code in Blade Battle. 

What codes can be redeemed for free Spins? 

Codes like ‚ÄúHAPPY‚Äù and ‚ÄúCODE‚Äù can be activated for free Spins. 

How often do the active codes expire? 

There are no expiration timelines; hence, you can expect the codes to go inactive at any moment.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for The Forge, Merge And Fight, and Uma Racing. Join the Insider Gaming Discord community to stay up to date with the latest happenings in the gaming world.

item.title: Stellar Blade Director Receives Recognition from South Korean President
item.content:encoded:
Hyung-tae Kim, the CEO of Shift Up and the director behind Stellar Blade, has received a Presidential Commendation in South Korea. This prestigious awardwas presented by the South Korean President himself, and it was given for Kim‚Äôs services to the domestic game industry.

While Stellar Blade was mentioned, the award was also given amidst recognition of Shift Up‚Äôs other games, like Goddess of Victory: NIKKE.

Stellar Blade Was a Game-Changing Title

Stellar Blade first dropped in April 2024, before being released on PC a little more than a year later. The game would go on to sell millions of copies, with players being pulled in by the visuals and staying for the combat and intriguing story.

It‚Äôs no big secret that much of the attraction in Stellar Blade rests with the game‚Äôs protagonist, Eve. Her character model was built around a scanned representation of a South Korean glamour model, which gives you an idea of why the character was such a hit with gamers.

As revealed by Automaton Media, Hyung-tae Kim, the visionary director behind Shift Up‚Äôs Stellar Blade, recently received an award from the South Korean President, Lee Jae Myung. This commendation was bestowed upon Kim because of his contributions to the industry and ‚Äòachievements in overseas expansion‚Äô.

In the report, it was stressed that Kim ‚Äòhumbly thanked his development teams and Shift Up‚Äô for their pivotal work on bringing Stellar Blade to life.

In September, it was confirmed that a Stellar Blade sequel was in development and moving along quite nicely. In November, reports were circulated suggesting that Shift Up was targeting more platforms for further Steller Blade expansion, eyeing up the likes of Xbox and Nintendo.

Did you ever play Stellar Blade? Let us know what you thought about the game on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that Phantom Blade Zero could come to Xbox

item.title: Red Bull Has Turned 2000 Drones Into the World‚Äôs Largest Game of Tetris
item.content:encoded:
Red Bull has created the world‚Äôs largest game of Tetris powered by 2000 drones as a part of the Red Bull Tetris World final.

The special event saw Red Bull use the iconic 150-metre high Dubai Frame, which opened in 2018, as the border for the Tetris game, which Red Bull says made the game the ‚Äúworld‚Äôs first open-air, live playable Tetris game‚Äù.

A grand total of 2800 drones were used for the game, with each player needing 1400 drones per game due to the drones‚Äô battery life.

Fehmi Atalar of T√ºrkiye went home as the champion of the game, achieving a score of 168,566 during the five-minute game. Leo Sol√≥rzano of Peru managed a score of 57,164.

Red Bull described the event as ‚Äúphone to drone, with Qualifiers featuring participants in 60 countries playing directly on their mobile devices.

‚ÄúThis event was one of a kind. It‚Äôs not a thing you can describe in words,‚Äù said Red Bull Tetris World final winner Fehmi Atalar.

‚ÄúOver [my] five years of Tetris experience, this was the best moment, and this event was one of a kind. It‚Äôs not a thing you can describe in words,‚Äù Atalar concluded. ‚ÄúI managed to play like a machine, and although I could have done things a bit cleaner, I achieved a flawless run and did not miss a single point in any of my matches, so I am very happy.‚Äù

What do you think of 2000+ drones making the world‚Äôs largest game of Tetris? Share your thoughts on this update through the free-to-play Insider Gaming Discord Server.

For more IG news, read about Lords of the Fallen 2‚Äôs CEO saying the game has ‚ÄòAttractive Female Characters‚Äô in ‚ÄòRevealing Outfits,‚Äô and Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 4 multiplayer reportedly being ‚ÄòA Complete Copy of Modern Warfare 2.‚Äô
